title: I didn't get my IP boost for verifying my email D:
body: So it's been more than 48 hours, and i'm still not getting my boost for some reason D:

replies.body: The email verification promo happened a bit ago, and is no longer active.  I don't have any details on any replacement promos, but keep an eye out on our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page should something come up!

Well... that may partially be because... they no longer exist.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
